name: rambo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] someone who uses, or threatens to use, strong and violent methods against their enemies: The Americans responded, Rambo-style/Rambo-like, by threatening to attack immediately if their conditions were not met.
Rambo was originally a film character known for his violence, who was played by Sylvester Stallone in several films.
